title: 4 wounded in San Pedro shooting, police say
content:
SAN PEDRO, LOS ANGELES (KABC) --
Four people were wounded in a shooting in San Pedro Monday evening, police said.
The shooting occurred in the 300 block of West 2nd Street just before 6:30 p.m. Three people were brought to a hospital by ambulance and another was transported in a private vehicle, police said.
The victims were identified as two women, one man and a juvenile male.
The injuries were not considered life-threatening.
No suspect information was available.
Police are investigating.
